title: Keep Component Small
paragraph: And Function-specific, easier for Testing, maintenence, reuse, update, and to implement performane optimization.

title: Reusability
paragraph: One function means one component, Reuse not rebuild.

title: PascalCase
paragraph: Capitals for component's names and functions.

title: Separation
paragraph: Separate stateful aspects from rendering. It's better to have one stateful component to load dataand another stateless component to display that data.

title: In One Folder
paragraph: All files related to any feature or route should be in a single folder. .js / .test/ .css

title: Testing
paragraph: Write test for all code which should be executed as expected.
